description: ERECTION OF A TWO-STOREY SIDE EXTENSION AND ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH INSTALLATION OF 3 x ROOFLIGHTS TO FRONT ROOF SLOPE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Other than the location of the window openings shown on the proposed flank elevation , the development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Ordnance Survey style map, SA-1-01 and SA-1-02 (Rev A).

Condition : 3 - The facing materials used in the development hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building in materials, style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied, the new window to the enlarged bathroom in the rear elevation at first floor level, to the proposed study facing south east at first floor level and the landing also facing south east shall be glazed with obscured glass up to 1.7m above internal finished floor level and fixed shut and shall permanently maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no window, or other opening other than those expressly authorised by this permission shall be constructed in the flank wall of the two storey side extension without planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - In accordance with paragraphs 186 and 187 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:
"	The application was approved without delay.
Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE: For the avoidance of doubt this decision is based on the position and width of window openings on the flank elevation as shown on the proposed floor plans.
